entries.femaleVariant: Little is known about the bloody terrorist attack perpetrated recently by an unknown organization at Night City International and Translunar. Echoes of the bloodbath continue unabated.
Yes, Night Corp – it must be said! To Night Corp, the spaceport in Night City is a symbol of yet another failure in their space race against Orbital Air, the leader in orbital technology!
Here, now, I call upon Night Corp's governors and executives to accept both financial and legal responsibility for this act of barbarism!
Dozens of victims, chiefly Orbital Air staff, the paralysis of air and space travel, and losses going into billions of eurodollars – these are the sad results of this senseless act of aggression.
Today, we talk to Leslie Wawuda, Orbital Air CEO, speaking to us from Nairobi, Kenya, where Mr. Wawuda did manage to travel.
Mr. Wawuda, you claim to know exactly who's responsible for the recent attack on what is clearly the jewel in your corporation's crown.

They would destroy us out of envy for our success! This attack was a futile attempt at sabotaging Orbital Air's pioneering research into the Alpha Centauri system, the results of which – allow me to remind you – will serve all humankind.
